ios.sim.prod.build: yarn prepare:prod && xcodebuild -workspace ios/GoldWallet.xcworkspace -scheme GoldWallet -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build -quiet

ios.sim.beta.build: yarn prepare:beta && xcodebuild -workspace ios/GoldWallet.xcworkspace -scheme "GoldWallet beta" -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build -quiet

android.emu.prod.build: yarn prepare:prod && cd android && ./gradlew assembleProdDebug assembleProdDebugAndroidTest -DtestBuildType=debug && cd ..

android.emu.beta.build: yarn prepare:beta && cd android && ./gradlew assembleBetaDebug assembleBetaDebugAndroidTest -DtestBuildType=debug && cd ..
